text: avarkaḷ ettakaiyōr eṉṟāl allāh(viṉ tiru nāmam) kūṟappeṟṟāl, avarkaḷuṭaiya itayaṅkaḷ accattāl naṭuṅkum; aṉṟiyum taṅkaḷukku ēṟpaṭum tuṉpaṅkaḷaip poṟumaiyuṭaṉ cakittuk koḷvōrākavum, toḻukaiyaic carivarak kaṭaippiṭippōrākavum, nām avarkaḷukku aḷittavaṟṟiliruntu (iṟavaiṉiṉ pātaiyil) celavu ceyvōrākavum iruppārkḷa
